name: part_008
file: tmp_【#白上フブキ生誕LIVE】Congrats Birthday FOX【ホロライブ⧸白上フブキ】 [7Vs-5Rwu8ks]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Susume! BAKATARATION' by Bakatare-domo.
MC section where Bakatare-domo announces their first original song as a unit.
Shirakami Fubuki performs 'Namida no Tane, Egao no Hana'.
scenes.song_name: Namida no Tane, Egao no Hana

subtitles.original: バカタレ最高！
subtitles.english: Bakatare is the best!

subtitles.original: 遊び足りない日は
subtitles.english: On days when we haven't played enough,

subtitles.original: もう少しいっしょに
subtitles.english: let's stay together a little longer.

subtitles.original: （もっともっといっしょに）
subtitles.english: (More and more together)

subtitles.original: みんなでときめく
subtitles.english: Our heart-pounding

subtitles.original: 無敵の友情
subtitles.english: invincible friendship,

subtitles.original: 未来へと振りかざして
subtitles.english: hold it high towards the future!

subtitles.original: さぁ進め バカタレーション
subtitles.english: Now, onwards, BAKATARATION!

subtitles.original: 楽しんじゃえサイコー！
subtitles.english: Let's have the best time!

subtitles.original: 撫でてよネッタプ
subtitles.english: Stroke it, Net-up!

subtitles.original: 今夜も踊りおまけテンションで！
subtitles.english: Tonight as well, dancing with extra high spirits!

subtitles.original: 私たちがナンバーワン！
subtitles.english: We are number one!

subtitles.original: いつだってオンステージ
subtitles.english: Always on stage.

subtitles.original: これまでも ここからも
subtitles.english: Until now, and from now on too,

subtitles.original: ワクワク続いていくよ
subtitles.english: the excitement will continue!

subtitles.original: はーい！
subtitles.english: Hi!

subtitles.original: ということで、突然で皆さんびっくりしたと思いますけども
subtitles.english: So, I think everyone was surprised by the sudden announcement...

subtitles.original: なんと！ この度、バカタレどものオリジナル楽曲ができました！
subtitles.english: Believe it or not! An original song for us, 'Bakatare', has been made!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！ やったー！
subtitles.english: Yay! We did it!

subtitles.original: フブちゃんのお誕生日プレゼントってこと？
subtitles.english: So it's a birthday present for Fubu-chan?

subtitles.original: えっ、そういうことなのこれって？
subtitles.english: Eh, is that what this is?

subtitles.original: そういうことさ！
subtitles.english: That's exactly it!

subtitles.original: そういうことだったの？ なるほど
subtitles.english: Is that so? I see.

subtitles.original: 誕生日にもらっちゃいました、いや嬉しいですね！
subtitles.english: I received it for my birthday, I'm so happy!

subtitles.original: こっそり準備してたじゃないか、ね、一緒にみんなで
subtitles.english: We were secretly preparing it, right? All of us together.

subtitles.original: ということで今回は『進め！BAKATARATION』ということでね、オリ曲を！
subtitles.english: So this time, it's 'Onwards! BAKATARATION', our original song!

subtitles.original: はい、作ってみんなで躍らせていただきました！
subtitles.english: Yes, we made it and performed the dance together!

subtitles.original: 全員バラバラの方角向いてるが…ｗ
subtitles.english: We're all facing different directions though... lol

subtitles.original: あっち！ あっち！ あっち！
subtitles.english: That way! That way! That way!

subtitles.original: はい、こちらの楽曲ですね、MVとかね、発売とかは…
subtitles.english: Yes, about this song, the MV and the release...

subtitles.original: あ、もちろん、もちろんするんですけども！
subtitles.english: Ah, of course, of course we will!

subtitles.original: 今ね、運営さんたちと相談しながら制作中でございますので
subtitles.english: We're currently in the middle of production while consulting with the staff.

subtitles.original: はい、聴きたい方はぜひともまたこのライブのアーカイブを見直していただいて
subtitles.english: So if you want to hear it, please rewatch the archive of this live,

subtitles.original: 覚えてもらって、いつかはライブでやるぞ！
subtitles.english: memorize it, and someday we'll perform it at a live concert!

subtitles.original: いつかはバカタレライブでこの曲を歌いたいと思います、また！
subtitles.english: I want to sing this song again at a Bakatare live concert someday!

subtitles.original: まだまだバカタレ、目が離せませんよ！
subtitles.english: Don't take your eyes off Bakatare yet!

subtitles.original: ということで皆さんありがとうございました、バカタレどもでした！
subtitles.english: So, thank you everyone, we were Bakatare!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございましたー！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: この胸に あの日君が蒔いた
subtitles.english: In this heart, you sowed on that day

subtitles.original: 小さな涙の種
subtitles.english: a small seed of tears.

subtitles.original: いつか大きな笑顔の花
subtitles.english: Someday, a large flower of smiles

subtitles.original: 咲かせるその日まで
subtitles.english: until the day I make it bloom...

subtitles.original: 目まぐるしい毎日の中までも
subtitles.english: Even in the midst of dizzying days,

subtitles.original: ときどき不意に巻き戻してる
subtitles.english: sometimes I'm suddenly rewinding.

subtitles.original: あの先もずっと君といられたら
subtitles.english: If I could be with you forever beyond that,

subtitles.original: もしもの未来
subtitles.english: a 'what if' future.

subtitles.original: どこにもいない姿を
subtitles.english: Your figure that is nowhere to be found,

subtitles.original: どこにいても感じたまま
subtitles.english: I still feel it no matter where I am.

subtitles.original: 今日も同じ空の下で
subtitles.english: Today as well, under the same sky,

subtitles.original: 明日へと向かうよ
subtitles.english: I'm heading towards tomorrow.

subtitles.original: 繰り返す言葉はそうまるで
subtitles.english: The repeated words are almost like

subtitles.original: 心を溶かすように
subtitles.english: they are melting my heart.

subtitles.original: 僕に今 語りかけるんだ
subtitles.english: They are talking to me now

subtitles.original: 愛おしいその声で
subtitles.english: with that beloved voice.

subtitles.original: この胸に あの日君が蒔いた
subtitles.english: In this heart, you sowed on that day

subtitles.original: 小さな涙の種
subtitles.english: a small seed of tears.

subtitles.original: いつか大きな笑顔の花
subtitles.english: Someday, a large flower of smiles

subtitles.original: 咲かせるその日まで
subtitles.english: until the day I make it bloom.

subtitles.original: ここにいるから
subtitles.english: Because I am here.

subtitles.original: 特別すぎる事ではなくて
subtitles.english: It's not about things that are too special,

subtitles.original: やがて誰もがその意味を知る
subtitles.english: soon everyone will know the meaning.

subtitles.original: 赤く燃え尽きる雲の切れ間には
subtitles.english: In the gaps of the clouds burning out red,

subtitles.original: 星が瞬く
subtitles.english: stars twinkle.

subtitles.original: その瞳は今どこで
subtitles.english: Where are those eyes now,

subtitles.original: どんな景色を見てるの
subtitles.english: what kind of scenery are they looking at?

subtitles.original: 君が好きだった季節が
subtitles.english: The season you liked

subtitles.original: また巡ってくるよ
subtitles.english: is coming around again.
